We're Not Secure Anymore

This is for beginners

June 13st, 2015

There is one topic that cannot be denied this week. Online security is a dangerous national security issue. The United States government was recently hacked and more than 4 million records with private and personally identifiable informationw was compromised. Anyone can be hacked at any time. The most advanced hackers are getting better and it's reasonable to believe that a rising tide is making it easier for amateur hackers.

We all need to think about our web security. Ensure the basic precautions have been taken. If you have the technical resources you should complete much more than the basic update.
